title: Derivative function
text: Since $$v(t)=s′(t)$$ and $$a(t)=v′(t)=s''(t)$$, we begin by finding the derivative of s(t): $$s'(t)=\lim_{h\to0} \frac{s\left(t+h\right)-s\left(t\right)}{h}$$
